questions.quote: Nah, I guess I should really get moving on this, huh? I'm gonna go.
Well, Play Now is through playing. They turned the heat way up in my office. They tried to sweat me out.
Uh, good. You know, you might wanna try eating it with one of these.
Me neither. I love the previews. In fact I enjoy being in the theatre cut up. Last week after a preview, I yelled out 'Must miss'.
Why does Radio Shack ask for your phone number when you buy batteries? I don't know.
What are you like a sadist? No matter how bad somebody feels, you can make 'em feel worse. I bet you're rooting for a tumor.
Yeah, hey did I see you on TV at the Ranger game? Were those your seats right behind the glass?
"One hundred percent Cotton Dockers. If they're not Dockers, they're just pants"
Hey, I didn't do anything. I was never informed. … YOU CAN ALL GO STRAIGHT TO HELL…. You see that? You see what I am going through?
Of course, the plane cake with the sweet brown crumbs on the top.
